inclusion.criterion: Written or thumb print informed consent from the mother during pregnancy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Neonates who are born to mothers who followed antenatal care at SMRU antenatal clinics
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Neonates who are born in a SMRU clinic OR neonates who are born outside SMRU but visit a SMRU clinic within 48 hours after birth
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: a SMRU clinic within 48 hours after birth OR neonates who are born outside SMRU and present with neonatal jaundice at any moment in the first 8 days
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No written or thumb print informed consent from the mother during pregnancy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Neonates who are born to mothers who did not follow antenatal care
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Neonate born outside SMRU and present > 48 hours after delivery without jaundice
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 5 months old male with an undescended testis. He was born at 38 weeks gestation to a healthy mother who followed antenatal care.
